searchAwardPointLike: select ap.ap_point_id, ap.ap_point_name, ap.ap_point, concat(to_char(gp.gp_create_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), ' ::: ', to_char(gp.gp_create_date, 'HH24:MI'), ' น.') as "date",gp.gp_emp_id, gp.gp_remark, concat(to_char(gp.gp_create_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), ' ', to_char(gp.gp_create_date, 'HH24:MI'), ' น.') as create_date, concat(to_char(gp.gp_update_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), ' ', to_char(gp.gp_update_date, 'HH24:MI'), ' น.') as update_date from public.give_point gp left join public.award_point ap on gp.gp_award_point_id = ap.ap_id where ap.ap_company_id = $1 and ap.ap_is_use = true and gp.gp_is_use = true and ($2::text is null or ap.ap_point_id::text LIKE '%' || $2 || '%') and ($3::text is null or ap.ap_point_name::text LIKE '%' || $3 || '%') and gp.gp_create_date between $4 and $5 ORDER by gp.gp_create_date DESC
searchAwardPointDateNull: select ap.ap_point_id, ap.ap_point_name, ap.ap_point, concat(to_char(gp.gp_create_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), ' ::: ', to_char(gp.gp_create_date, 'HH24:MI'), ' น.') as "date",gp.gp_emp_id, gp.gp_remark from public.give_point gp left join public.award_point ap on gp.gp_award_point_id = ap.ap_id where ap.ap_company_id = $1 and ap.ap_is_use = true and gp.gp_is_use = true and ($2::text is null or ap.ap_point_id::text LIKE '%' || $2 || '%') and ($3::text is null or ap.ap_point_name::text LIKE '%' || $3 || '%') ORDER by gp.gp_create_date DESC
searchThankPointLike: select tp.tp_point_id, tp.tp_point_name, tp.tp_point, concat(to_char(tph.tph_create_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), ' ::: ', to_char(tph.tph_create_date, 'HH24:MI'), ' น.') as "date", tph.tph_emp_id as user_give, tph.tph_receive_emp_id as user_receive, tph.tph_remark, concat(to_char(tph.tph_create_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), ' ', to_char(tph.tph_create_date, 'HH24:MI'), ' น.') as create_date, concat(to_char(tph.tph_update_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), ' ', to_char(tph.tph_update_date, 'HH24:MI'), ' น.') as update_date, tph.tph_receive_emp_name as receive_name, tph.tph_give_emp_name as give_name from public.thank_point_history tph left join public.thank_point tp on tph.tph_thank_point_id = tp.tp_id where tph.tph_is_use = true and tp.tp_company_id = $1 and ($2::text is null or tp.tp_point_id::text LIKE '%' || $2 || '%') and ($3::text is null or tp.tp_point_name::text LIKE '%' || $3 || '%') and tph.tph_create_date between $4 and $5 and ($6::text is null or tph.tph_give_emp_name::text LIKE '%' || $6 || '%') and ($7::text is null or tph.tph_receive_emp_name::text LIKE '%' || $7 || '%') ORDER by tph.tph_create_date DESC
searchThankPointDateNull: select tp.tp_point_id, tp.tp_point_name, tp.tp_point, concat(to_char(tph.tph_create_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), ' ::: ', to_char(tph.tph_create_date, 'HH24:MI'), ' น.') as "date", tph.tph_emp_id as user_give, tph.tph_receive_emp_id as user_receive, tph.tph_remark, tph.tph_receive_emp_name as receive_name, tph.tph_give_emp_name as give_name from public.thank_point_history tph left join public.thank_point tp on tph.tph_thank_point_id = tp.tp_id where tph.tph_is_use = true and tp.tp_company_id = $1 and ($2::text is null or tp.tp_point_id::text LIKE '%' || $2 || '%') and ($3::text is null or tp.tp_point_name::text LIKE '%' || $3 || '%') and ($4::text is null or tph.tph_give_emp_name::text LIKE '%' || $4 || '%') and ($5::text is null or tph.tph_receive_emp_name::text LIKE '%' || $5 || '%') ORDER by tph.tph_create_date DESC
searchAwardPointLikeByUser: select ap.ap_point_id, ap.ap_point_name, ap.ap_point, concat(to_char(gp.gp_create_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), ' ::: ', to_char(gp.gp_create_date, 'HH24:MI'), ' น.') as "date",gp.gp_emp_id, gp.gp_remark  from public.give_point gp left join public.award_point ap on gp.gp_award_point_id = ap.ap_id where ap.ap_company_id = $1 and ap.ap_is_use = true and gp.gp_is_use = true and ($2::text is null or ap.ap_point_id::text LIKE '%' || $2 || '%') and ($3::text is null or ap.ap_point_name::text LIKE '%' || $3 || '%') and gp.gp_create_date between $4 and $5 and gp.gp_emp_id = $6 ORDER by gp.gp_create_date DESC
searchAwardPointDateNullByUser: select ap.ap_point_id, ap.ap_point_name, ap.ap_point, concat(to_char(gp.gp_create_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), ' ::: ', to_char(gp.gp_create_date, 'HH24:MI'), ' น.') as "date",gp.gp_emp_id, gp.gp_remark  from public.give_point gp left join public.award_point ap on gp.gp_award_point_id = ap.ap_id where ap.ap_company_id = $1 and ap.ap_is_use = true and gp.gp_is_use = true and ($2::text is null or ap.ap_point_id::text LIKE '%' || $2 || '%') and ($3::text is null or ap.ap_point_name::text LIKE '%' || $3 || '%') and gp.gp_emp_id = $4 ORDER by gp.gp_create_date DESC
getUserById: select e.emp_name_th from employee e where e.id = $1
searchUser: select e.id, e.emp_name_th from employee e where e.is_use = true and e.emp_name_th LIKE '%' || $1 || '%'
searchAwardPointDateMax: select max(gp.gp_create_date) as max_date from give_point gp left join award_point ap on ap.ap_id = gp.gp_award_point_id where gp_is_use = true and ap.ap_company_id = $1
searchAwardPointDateMin: select min(gp.gp_create_date) as min_date from give_point gp left join award_point ap on ap.ap_id = gp.gp_award_point_id where gp_is_use = true and ap.ap_company_id = $1
searchThankPointDateMax: select max(tph.tph_create_date) as max_date from thank_point_history tph left join thank_point tp on tp.tp_id = tph.tph_thank_point_id where tph.tph_is_use = true and tp.tp_company_id = $1
searchThankPointDateMin: select min(tph.tph_create_date) as min_date from thank_point_history tph left join thank_point tp on tp.tp_id = tph.tph_thank_point_id where tph.tph_is_use = true and tp.tp_company_id = $1
getUserByID: select e.emp_name_th from employee e where e.is_use = true and e.id = $1
